18#include "ODWriterHelper.h"
19#include "BitMatrix.h"
20#include <algorithm>
21
22namespace ZXing {
23namespace OneD {
24
25/**
26* @return a byte array of horizontal pixels (0 = white, 1 = black)
27*/
28BitMatrix
29WriterHelper::RenderResult(const std::vector<bool>& code, int width, int height, int sidesMargin)
30{
31 int inputWidth = Size(code);
32 // Add quiet zone on both sides.
33 int fullWidth = inputWidth + sidesMargin;
34 int outputWidth = std::max(width, fullWidth);
35 int outputHeight = std::max(1, height);
36
37 int multiple = outputWidth / fullWidth;
38 int leftPadding = (outputWidth - (inputWidth * multiple)) / 2;
39
40 BitMatrix result(outputWidth, outputHeight);
41 for (int inputX = 0, outputX = leftPadding; inputX < inputWidth; inputX++, outputX += multiple) {
42 if (code[inputX]) {
43 result.setRegion(outputX, 0, multiple, outputHeight);
44 }
45 }
46 return result;
47}
48
49/**
50* @param target encode black/white pattern into this array
51* @param pos position to start encoding at in {@code target}
52* @param pattern lengths of black/white runs to encode
53* @param startColor starting color - false for white, true for black
54* @return the number of elements added to target.
55*/
56int
57WriterHelper::AppendPattern(std::vector<bool>& target, int pos, const int* pattern, size_t patternCount, bool startColor)
58{
59 bool color = startColor;
60 int numAdded = 0;
61 for (size_t i = 0; i < patternCount; ++i) {
62 int s = pattern[i];
63 for (int j = 0; j < s; j++) {
64 target[pos++] = color;
65 }
66 numAdded += s;
67 color = !color; // flip color after each segment
68 }
69 return numAdded;
70}
71
72} // OneD
73} // ZXing
74
